T02D3558:191b-1: badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3558:192a-2: rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3558:192a-3: rdo rje bzhi'i rim pas sgrub thabs bri bar bya'o //
T02D3558:192a-4: sngon ma bzhin du snying gar aam yig las zla
T02D3558:192a-5: ba bsgoms te sdig pa bshags nas dang por stong
T02D3558:192a-6: pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa /
T02D3558:192a-7: pam yig las skyes pa'i chu skyes la zla ba /
T02D3558:192a-8: aam yig gi sa bon las spro ba la sogs
T02D3558:192a-9: pa las yang dag par byung ba'i sku mdog dkar
T02D3558:192a-11: phyag g-yas na chu skyes dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3558:192a-12: g-yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti bsnams pa /
T02D3558:192a-13: rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas aom badzra sa m'a
T02D3558:192a-14: dza: dz'a:dz'a:dz'a:zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la
T02D3558:192a-15: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas shes rab kyi pha
T02D3558:192a-16: rol tu phyin ma rdo rje skyil mo krung gis
T02D3558:192a-18: de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i aom yig
T02D3558:192a-19: bsgoms nas spra ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i
T02D3558:192a-20: rim pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3558:192a-21: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni /
T02D3558:192a-22: dzva la dzva la me dha bardha ni /
T02D3558:192a-23: dhi ri dhi ri budhi bardha ni sv'ah'a /
T02D3558:192a-24: mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du 'bar bzhin pa zhal
T02D3558:192a-25: nas 'thon te lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu
T02D3558:192a-27: de bzhin du gzhan yang 'dis blta bar bya'o //
T02D3558:192a-28: de bzhin du yang gsungs te /
T02D3558:192a-29: dang po stong pa'i byang chub ste //
T02D3558:192a-30: gnyis pa sa bon bsdu ba yin //
T02D3558:192a-31: gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa bzhin //
T02D3558:192a-32: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
